  1. Notify Me allows you to subscribe to an unlimited number of email lists. Receive email or text message updates regarding the information you have requested. Read on... about Stay Connected
  2. Update on Trash Service: TDS has asked customers to leave their carts out this week until they are able to be serviced. Due to varying ice accumulation, TDS will service carts as they are able to navigate the routes. Thank you for your patience.

  3. City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather

    Due to inclement weather and hazardous travel conditions, City Hall and Police administrative offices will be closed Tuesday, January 27, 2026. Read on... about City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather
  4. Work continues to stabilize the west cliffs before construction begins on the Loop 360 at Courtyard Drive/RM 222 project this summer. Read on for more info. Read on... about Loop 360 Project Updates
  5. Notify Me allows you to subscribe to an unlimited number of email lists. Receive email or text message updates regarding the information you have requested. Read on... about Stay Connected
  6. Update on Trash Service: TDS has asked customers to leave their carts out this week until they are able to be serviced. Due to varying ice accumulation, TDS will service carts as they are able to navigate the routes. Thank you for your patience.

    Due to inclement weather and hazardous travel conditions, City Hall and Police administrative offices will be closed Tuesday, January 27, 2026. Read on... about City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather
